title: Cheap speakers or headphones?
comments:
Just get a TWS. 

It's much better than getting a cheap Headphone or a cheap Speaker.

Then my old wired earphones instantly become obsolete. I also feel the ear pain much more so, with headsets that fit directly inside into your ear.

I would prefer a speaker or an over-ear headset that can actually deliver better sound than my laptop/built in monitor speakers.

I will be spending the majority of my life on my desk. Portability is not a major concern. I'd rather avoid anything that runs on battery/wireless.

Hmm, okay.

Just a suggestion, don't buy a boat product.

I see Amazon recommending them to me all the time, but never bought anything from them because... money. 

They bad?

But I though most of Amazon was...


Should probably wait for the first speaker to get restocked anyway... better than any of those  RGB night lamps that are in the speakers section.

For good sound at this price range I'd suggest iems like [7hz Zero](https://www.theaudiostore.in/products/7hz-salnotes-zero-iem) or [Tangzu Waner](https://www.headphonezone.in/products/tangzu-waner-s-g)

https://www.amazon.in/CREATIVE-Pebble-Desktop-Speakers-Black/dp/B0791H74NT

I would not go below this
They just raised the price by 400 Rs. It was 1800 just a day ago.
